name: basant-portfolio-monorepo
description: Basant Abdalla Portfolio - Monorepo with Frontend, Backend, and Styling

scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:styles
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:styles
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend && npm run format:styles
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:styles
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.deploy:frontend: echo 'Deploy frontend to your hosting platform'
scripts.deploy:backend: echo 'Deploy backend to your hosting platform'

author: Basant Abdalla
